  • RGB hex - #223344

sys_properties.name: sn_atf.schedule.suite_result_email.error_color

sys_properties.name: sn_atf.schedule.suite_result_email.fail_color

sys_properties.name: sn_atf.schedule.suite_result_email.pass_color
